hero.title: Bringing Visions to Life through Flawless User Experiences
hero.subtitle: Hi! I'm Antonio, a React/Next.js Developer based in Seville, Spain.

card1.title: Planning & Strategy
card1.description: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.

card2.title: Development & Progress Update
card2.description: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.

card3.title: Testing & Launch
card3.description: Before launch, I rigorously test your site on multiple devices and browsers to ensure a seamless user experience. Once everything looks good, I'll help you deploy your site.

footer.title3: digital presence to the next level?
footer.subtitle: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.

1.title: I prioritize client collaboration, fostering open communication

2.title: I'm very flexible with time zone communications

4.title: Tech enthusiast with a passion for development.

5.title: Currently building a powered by IA pictures app

6.title: Do you want to start a project together?

1.title: Kollab
1.des: Create collaborative text documents in real time with Kollab. Edit, share, and collaborate with colleagues in a team-oriented workspace.

2.title: Meridian
2.des: Keep all your bank accounts in one place with Meridian. Manage your finances efficiently and securely.

1.quote: Collaborating with Antonio was an absolute pleasure. His professionalism, promptness, and dedication to delivering exceptional results were evident throughout our project. Antonio's enthusiasm for every facet of development truly stands out. If you're seeking to elevate your website and elevate your brand, Antonio is the ideal partner.

5.title: CEO of Visual Routine Studio

1.title: Experience in Incident Management Applications
1.desc: Development and maintenance of applications for managing incidents and failures in international production environments, ensuring optimal performance and data security.

2.title: Development of Applications for the Banking Sector
2.desc: Design and construction of web applications focused on loan management and client portals for online banking, implementing modern architectures like microfrontends.

3.title: Migration and Evolution of Application Ecosystems
3.desc: Involvement in the migration of internal applications to modern technologies, enhancing scalability and security in systems for government agencies.

4.title: Implementation of Agile Methodologies and Best Development Practices
4.desc: Application of Agile methodologies such as SCRUM and GitFlow in collaborative environments, integrating automated testing to ensure software quality.

5.title: Expertise in Automated Testing and Quality Assurance
5.desc: Utilization of tools like Jest for unit testing and Cypress for end-to-end testing, ensuring a robust workflow and maintaining software quality in critical applications.

6.title: Team Leadership and Effective Communication
6.desc: Leadership of multidisciplinary teams in software development projects, ensuring clear communication with clients and stakeholders, and fostering collaboration in Agile environments.
